mapper.select: SELECT B.*, RT.CAPACITY FROM BOOKING B INNER JOIN ROOMTYPE RT USING(ROOMTYPE) INNER JOIN RESERVED RS USING(ROOMNUMBER) WHERE ROOMNUMBER = #{roomNumber} AND RS.RESERVATIONDATE = CURDATE() AND RS.ROOMSTATUS = '예약완료' AND CURDATE() BETWEEN B.CHECKINDATE AND B.CHECKOUTDATE;

SELECT B.*, RT.CAPACITY FROM BOOKING B INNER JOIN ROOMTYPE RT USING(ROOMTYPE) INNER JOIN RESERVED RS USING(ROOMNUMBER) WHERE ROOMNUMBER = #{roomNumber} AND RS.RESERVATIONDATE = CURDATE() AND RS.ROOMSTATUS = '재실' AND CURDATE() BETWEEN B.CHECKINDATE AND B.CHECKOUTDATE;
mapper.update: UPDATE BOOKING SET CHECKOUTDATE =#{checkoutDate}, GUESTCOUNT=#{guestCount} WHERE RESERVATIONNUMBER =#{reservationNumber}
UPDATE RESERVED SET ROOMSTATUS='재실' WHERE ROOMNUMBER =#{roomNumber} AND RESERVATIONDATE BETWEEN #{checkinDate} AND #{checkoutDate};
UPDATE RESERVED SET ROOMSTATUS='청소요청' WHERE ROOMNUMBER =#{roomNumber} AND RESERVATIONDATE BETWEEN #{checkinDate} AND #{checkoutDate};

UPDATE HOTELSTOCK HS INNER JOIN ROOMSTOCK ST ON HS.INVENTORYID = ST.INVENTORYID INNER JOIN BOOKING B ON ST.ROOMTYPE = B.ROOMTYPE INNER JOIN RESERVED RS ON RS.ROOMNUMBER = B.ROOMNUMBER SET HS.CURRENTSTOCK = HS.CURRENTSTOCK - ST.COUNT WHERE CURDATE() BETWEEN B.CHECKINDATE AND B.CHECKOUTDATE AND B.ROOMNUMBER =#{roomNumber} AND RS.RESERVATIONDATE = CURDATE() AND RS.ROOMSTATUS = '재실';
